resources.string:
Hi, my name is Saya. 

I love cat. 

My hobbies are listening to music, shopping, and collecting cosmetics! 

My recent passions are collecting coffee beans and playing with my cat. 

My cat's name is Daryl, he's a boy, and he's almost two years old. 
He's very curious, rambunctious, and spoiled! 
He is too energetic to take care of, but he heals me every day! :) 

But the problem is that I'm often away from home for work. Maybe He's feeling lonely... 
I hope to welcome a new family soon so that he can enjoy his life more. 

I hope to make many more memories with him in the future ! :)
